meanings.definition: Visit or go to regularly or habitually.
meanings.sent1: She frequents the library every Saturday to read books.
meanings.sent2: He frequents the park in the evenings for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat frequents the sunny spot on the windowsill for naps.
meanings.sent4: His mind frequents memories of childhood like a familiar town.
meanings.sent5: The old clock tower frequents the town square, a constant presence.

meanings.definition: Associate with or be a regular customer of.
meanings.sent1: They frequents the local cafe for their morning coffee.
meanings.sent2: She frequents the same hair salon for her monthly appointments.
meanings.sent3: The detective frequents the crime scene looking for clues.
meanings.sent4: His laughter frequents the room, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song frequents her thoughts, playing on repeat.
